text: the Colosseum it was in this vaunted
arena that the masses satisfied their
bloodlust as they watched lethal and
skilled gladiators fight to the death as
slaves or prisoners of war these
gladiators were forced into battle and
had but one choice win or die sometimes
the only hope of a fallen gladiator lie
in the whims of the Roman Emperor will
this fallen warrior survive to fight
another day or will he be fed to the
Lions
